code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Sidebar.css';import{getChats}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{onSelectChat}=_ref;const[chats,setChats]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchChats=async()=>{try{const res=await getChats();setChats(res.data);}catch(err){console.error('Failed to load chats',err);}};fetchChats();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Chats"}),chats.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No chats yet"}):chats.map(chat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-item",onClick:()=>onSelectChat(chat),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:chat.name||chat.number}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"last-message",children:chat.lastMessage})]},chat._id))]});};export default Sidebar;
